definition: strip/item/article/clause (of law or treaty)/classifier for long thin things (ribbon, river, road, trousers etc)
the Mukden or Manchurian Railway Incident of 18th September 1931 used by the Japanese as a pretext to annex Manchuria/also known as 9-18 incident 九一八事變|九一八事变[Jiu3 Yi1 ba1 Shi4 bian4]
see 柳條湖事件|柳条湖事件[Liu3 tiao2 Hu2 Shi4 jian4]
Willow palisade across Liaoning, 17th century barrier

sentences.english: The poor wicker husband went behind the bar, and poured himself a drink.
sentences.chinese: 可憐的柳條丈夫只好走到櫃檯後面給自己倒了杯酒。

sentences.english: To begin with, I decided to run up Willow Road as far as the Emersons' house.
sentences.chinese: 我決定開始時跑到柳條街上埃默生家的房子那兒。

sentences.english: The wicker husband was a little surprised: the baker never bothered to speak to him.
sentences.chinese: 柳條丈夫是些喫驚，因爲麪包師從未主動和他聊過。

sentences.english: The room was bare of all objects expect several packing crates placed around the room at random.
sentences.chinese: 房間的周圍隨意擺放一些包裝用的柳條箱。

sentences.english: As the musicians struck up, the wicker husband and the ugly girl went to dance.
sentences.chinese: 樂師們在演奏，柳條丈夫和醜女孩翩翩起舞。

sentences.english: Serve hot with pasta or rice.
sentences.chinese: 將牛柳條盛起，可伴飯或意粉同吃。

sentences.english: The principle instructors at The Atelier are Dale Redpath and Cyd Wicker.
sentences.chinese: 在這個原則的畫室老師是戴爾雷德帕斯和何秀蘭柳條。

sentences.english: Season shredded beef with salt and pepper. Marinate for a while and saute till cooked.
sentences.chinese: 牛柳條以適量鹽及胡椒粉調味，醃片刻後炒熟。

sentences.english: I will not ask my master to retire to his crate anymore.
sentences.chinese: 我不會再要求主人到柳條箱去就寢。

sentences.english: She seized hold of the butcher and reached up to kiss him.
sentences.chinese: 柳條女人走上前去，她抓住了屠夫，吻他。

sentences.english: Located in Shenyang, northeast, northwest wicker Lake overpass, Xikao grew up railway.
sentences.chinese: 位於瀋陽東北部，柳條湖立交橋西北，西靠長大鐵路。

sentences.english: They faced a dead end, terminating in a small shop selling wicker baskets.
sentences.chinese: 死衚衕，盡頭是一個賣柳條筐的小商店。

sentences.english: One day no song came up from the little wicker cage.
sentences.chinese: 終於有一天，不再有聲音從小柳條鳥籠裏傳出。

sentences.english: A wicker box which is made of skinless white twigs.
sentences.chinese: 他將不常用的東西放入柳條包。

sentences.english: Thus the rods meet their process to become debarked.
sentences.chinese: 這樣的轉變表示這些柳條已經滿足了剝皮的要求。

sentences.english: He'd locked his wife in the coal cellar in preparation.
sentences.chinese: 爲了迎接柳條女人，他把妻子鎖在了煤窯裏。

definition: clear as ice and clean as jade (idiom); spotless/irreproachable/incorruptible
to lie in disarray/to cut across/to traverse
to cut off/to interrupt/to prevent access
red flowers and green willow/all the colors of spring
Baqiao District of Xi’an 西安市[Xi1 an1 Shi4], Shaanxi
yellow flower (cosmetic powder used on women's forehead in former times)
